title: Elite Veteran
desc:
Post 15
***Wilderness Campout** (3x)*
Camouflage yourself and disappear into the trees. All visits to you will silently fail.
***Service Records** (1x, Unlocked by placing in top 3)*
Send a mod message to one random Town member and one random evil player, prioritizing killing roles, which proves that you are the Elite Veteran.
***PTSD** (Triggered if in last 4 alive)*
You will attack all living players.
